table.name: vtiger_salvaguardasriesgos
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salvaguardasriesgos` ( `salvaguardariesgoid` int(11) NOT NULL, `catsg` int(11) default NULL, `redprobabilidad` decimal(7,3) DEFAULT NULL, `catrsg` int(11) default NULL, `redimpacto` decimal(7,3) DEFAULT NULL, `referencia` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `tiposgrsg` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `salvaguardariesgo_no` varchar(56) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salvaguardariesgoid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_moduleclasscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salvaguardasriesgoscf` ( `salvaguardariesgoid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salvaguardariesgoid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
